thread.title: WH Spox: Trump Just Wants Attacks (And Himself) To Get Coverage They Deserve
thread.title_full: WH Spox: Trump Just Wants Attacks (And Himself) To Get Coverage They Deserve

author: Esme Cribb
title: WH Spox: Trump Just Wants Attacks (And Himself) To Get Coverage They Deserve
text:
White House press secretary Sean Spicer said Monday that President Donald Trump just wants terror attacks—as well as the "success that he's had" in his first weeks in office—to get the media coverage they "should be" given.
Read More →
